track.name: To Live & Die In L.A.
comments: "California Love part motherfucking 2, without gay ass Dre" always gets me.
THUG LIFE AINT JUST A WORD ITS A MOVEMENT ITS A LIFESTYLE.
This song makes me miss home! I miss u Cali!
Makes me miss living in LA every time :( You got to be there to know it!

‎"Costs me more to be free than a life in the pen." How ahead of his time was Tupac? There's no better statement on the inseparability of American “freedom” from socio-economic status and democracy from state-authorized discipline. He's saying that this ideal of Freedom is already corrupted by the death it forces you to endure in order to attain it. So what’s left? To live and die in L.A. on bail.
